hints.content: $277{,}451$ = $\blueD{2 \text{ hundred thousands}} +\redD{7 \text{ ten thousands}}$ + $\tealD{7 \text{ thousands}}$ + $\goldD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$ + $\purpleC{5\text{ tens}}$ + $\maroonD{1 \text{ one}}$
